title: Card Holder Slim Front Pocket Wallet Id Window Card Case Wallet with Rfid Blocking Card Holder Minimalist
description: RFID Protected!Matino Anvil's Anti-Breach Technology TM will stop anyone from obtaining your information. Wireless readers will not get through our RFID protection.Minimalist Slim Card Case Wallet By Matino AnvilA simple wallet for everything you need without the back pain of carrying a big wallet. Great for carrying your money and business cards as well. Nothing says "professional" like a business card coming out of a nice leather card case! Product Features:Measures: 4" x 3 1/4" x 1/8"Genuine LeatherFeatures Matino Anvil Anti-Breach Technology TM6 Card Slots Including 1 ID Slots and Money clip.
features: FUNCTIONAL & SLIM – Matino’s Wallet offers 6 card pockets: 1 easy-access front pocket and 6 inner pockets. The slim wallet is ideal for carrying business cards, credit and debit cards, bills etc.. The outside notch allows you to push out the cards easily

RFID BLOCKING - Our RFID blocking insulation prevents electronic pickpocketing and identity theft; your credit cards in the inner pocket of the wallet are protected from RFID theft (specifically 13.56 MHz RFID / NFC standard)
INTEGRATED MONEY CLIP - The metal money clip allows you to clip several bills inside your wallet
REFINED & STYLISH - Designed in Germany to best combine elegance, quality and convenience. Matino minimalist wallet is crafted with premium materials and great attention to detail
SLIM DOWN YOUR POCKET – We kept the dimensions of our slim wallet to 4.5" in x 2.8" in x .6" in. It will fit in your pocket perfectly without bulging out
